Reviews.Title: false advertising not workable phone
Reviews.Author: janice bonier
Reviews.Content: Was not programmable false advertising none working phoneNo non no non no no no non no non I no

Reviews.Title: Love it. Great Phone, just as described
Reviews.Author: Sharon W
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my sister's boyfriend.  He loved it. Great Product.  Will buy more in the future. Thanks

Reviews.Title: False.
Reviews.Author: Marisa Bermudez
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because mine always dies, but this phone was not unlocked and now I'm down over a hundred bucks with a useless phone.

Reviews.Title: Wrong phone received!
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: Received gsm version of the phone, model xt 910, not compatible with Verizon.Phone was in excellent condition despite being the wrong model.
